mean_cn: v. 使标准化；使合乎标准；立下标准；制定标准
mean_en: to make objects or activities of the same type have the same features or qualities; to make something standard
sentence: The factory standardized the shape of the products on the conveyor belt.
sentence_trans: 工厂对传送带上的产品的形状进行标准化加工。
word_etyma: standard标准 + ize使成为 → 使标准化
